title: Chocolate and ginger cookies
ingredients: ['115g unsalted butter', '50g caster sugar', '70g light brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 large egg', '70g 70% cacao dark chocolate', '65g finely chopped crystallised ginger', '160g plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 pinch salt']
